entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then light snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow with risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
